title: After setbacks, Democrats look for a reset ahead of 2022 votes
description: 2021 was a year of big accomplishments — and big disappointments — for the Biden administration. Mark Murray, Ben Kamisar and Bridget Bowman from the NBC News Political Unit join Chuck to look ahead to 2022.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: 2021 was a year of big accomplishments — and big disappointments — for the Biden administration. Mark Murray, Ben Kamisar and Bridget Bowman from the NBC News Political Unit join Chuck to look ahead to 2022.
